resources.string:
Special thanks to: 
 
 - J.Devauchelle for starting this project 
 - Andrew Dolgov for TT-RSS (http://tt-rss.org/) 
 - Google Inc. for some Code (Apache License) 
 - The Android Open Source Project for some Code (Apache License) 
 - Matthias Kaeppler for his implementation of an AbstractCache (Apache License) 
 - Ryan Fischbach for his implementation of PostMortemReportExceptionHandler (http://www.blackmoonit.com) 
 - OpenIntents.org for several parts of the OI FileManager 
 - http://hubpic.com/ for some images (Creative Commons License) 
 - two forty four a.m. LLC for the Locale Plugin-API (http://www.twofortyfouram.com/) 
 - Vladimir Nikic for HtmlCleaner (http://htmlcleaner.sourceforge.net) 
 - Igor Lyubimov for several improvements to the code (igor.lyubimov@gmail.com) 
 - David Luhmer for an improved HTML-Template (http://david-luhmer.de/wordpress/) 
 - Eduardo Ruiz for the spanish translation 
 - Jean-François Bilger for the french translation 
 - Stephan Windmüller for the german translation
